abstract: Now we are copy editors, designers, researchers, editorial assistants, photo editors. But some people at this magazine led strange past lives. One was an indie-rock bassist, one was a lawyer, another was a Canadian.  Now Mark van de Walle, a researcher here, has written about his past life as a hotel hand/amanuensis at the Paris Review.

headline.main: A Rock Star, a Lawyer and a Hotel Hand Walk Into a Magazine
